description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Croydon a Borough. A few hints upon the first election of Mayor, aldermen, and councillors, with some remarks as to the qualification and registration of burgesses, a copy of the charter and scheme of incorporation, and a reprint of the report of the enquiry, revised and corrected from “The Croydon Review” of December, 1881, by C. M. Elborough.]" Author: ELBOROUGH, Charles Marryat. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010368.s.83." Page: 2 Place of Publishing: Croydon Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: Sampson & Davey Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001052552 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
